case.title: I AM....ARE YOU - 44 (NYC)
case.text:
I AM DESIRABLE I AM SEXY I AM PETITE I AM PASSIONATE I AM SWEET I AM SENSUAL I AM GENUINE I AM A LOVER I AM THE REAL DEAL
BE SEXY BE GREAT LOOKING BE FASCINATING BE DESIRABLE BE FUN..AND FUNNY BE ADVENTUROUS BE LUSTFUL BE A STAND UP GUY
SWM ONLY 38-48 ONLY REPLY WITH PHOTOS ONLY
